In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

bors d+
This declaration shares most of its variables with the one above, can you make them into one section?

```suggestion
# Local properties of projective modules

```
copy paste leftover?
Should this be in the `Module` namespace?
This is listed twice, did you mean to include something else here?
Can this go to an earlier file?
David Swinarski is listed as Co-Author of the PR, maybe then also add them here?

```suggestion
# Local properties of submodules
```

```suggestion
```
The `section` does not seem to do anything
Maybe also a general `IsLocalizedModule` version is useful?
The docstrings in this file seem to all be about the version for `Ideal`s. For the sake of intuitive notation, could you also replace `I` and `J` (which allude to ideals) by e.g. `N` and `O`?

```suggestion
- `LinearMap.split_surjective_of_localization_maximal` If `N` is finitely presented, then `f : M â†’â‚—[R] N`
  being split injective can be checked on stalks (of maximal ideals).
```

```suggestion
/-- A submodule is trivial if its localization at every maximal ideal is trivial. -/
```
At some point we might want to have some syntax for variable blocks like this...

The unused variable linter flagged this.
```suggestion
    (H : âˆ€ (I : Ideal R), I.IsMaximal â†’
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(RingTheory/LocalProperties): being projective can be checked locally on stalks
